author: rovere
body:
#### PR description:

`runTheMatrix.py --interactive` has been broken since the recent changes introduced by #33338 and #33882, besides the adoption of `python3`. This PR fixes all problems.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all`

and

`runTheMatrix.py --interactive` to verify that the crashes were all fixed.
title: Fix runTheMatrix interactive shell
